message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value to you at $15,000. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This price not only represents a significant saving compared to its true value but also ensures that you secure this opportunity before it potentially goes to another interested party. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Kind regards, Alice
